②割：“春鏺草棘。”

鏺字的基本解释

鏺
pō
一种两边有钩、有刃，下有长木柄的镰刀。
割：“春鏺草棘。”

鏺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pō］
［《廣韻》普活切，入末，澇。］
(1)一种农具。两边有刃，装有木柄，用以割草。
(2)芟除。
(3)灭，除。

鏺字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏺； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1321第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?普活切，音潑。【說文】兩刃刀名。木柄，可以刈草。【集韻】或省作?。　又【正韻】刈也。【韓愈·曹成王?】鏺廣濟。　又【集韻】北末切，音撥。鐮也。

鏺
Basic explanation of words
鏺
pō
A sickle with a hook on both sides, a blade, and a long wooden handle underneath.
Cut: "Spring thorns."
鏺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pō]
["Guangyun" is generally lively, at the end, waterlogged. ]
(1) A farm tool. There are blades on both sides, equipped with wooden handles for cutting grass.
(2) Eliminate.
(3) Extinguish, divide.
鏺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏺; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1321 to 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Pu is lively, the sound is splashy. 【Said the text】The name of the two-edged sword. Wooden handle, you can mow grass. [Ji Yun] Or province for?.　 [Zheng Yun] 刈 also. 【Han Yu·Cao Cheng Wang?】Ji Guangji.　[Jiyun] North end cut, tone dial. Sickle.

鏺
Name meaning
Nothing.
pō
Ipō
(形声。 从金, 发声。 本义: 一种两边有刃、 装有长木柄的镰刀) 同本义 sickle
今农器镰、 斧、 鏺之类, 非砺不可。 --《农政全书》
IIpō
(1) 用镰刀、 钐刀等抡开来割 草、 谷物等cut with a sickle
春鏺草棘。 --《六韬·农器》
(2) 讨平 send armed forces to put down a rebellion
鏺广济, 掀蕲春。 --唐·韩愈《曹成王碑》
